HEADING: Check your answers now
CONFIRM_PROMPT: Please confirm the information you have given is true
JUROR_INFO: It's important to check that all the information is right before you send us your reply.
OB_INFO: It's important to check that all the information is right before you send this reply for the person who was summoned to jury service.
DETAILS_HEADER_OB: You gave us these details about the person you're replying for
DETAILS_HEADER_NORMAL: You gave us these juror details
OB_HEADING: You're replying for another person summoned for jury service. You told us this about yourself
OB_RELATIONSHIP_LABEL: Your relationship to the person you are replying for
OB_RELATIONSHIP_READER: your relationship to the person you are replying for
OB_WHY_QUESTION: Your reason for replying on behalf of the person summoned for jury service
OB_WHY_READER: your reason for replying on behalf of the person summoned for jury service
JUROR_QUALIFY_QUESTION_LIVED_CONSECUTIVE: Since you turned 13, has your main address been in the UK, Channel Islands or Isle of Man for any period of at least 5 years?
your answer to the question, 'Since you turned 13, has your main address been in the UK, Channel Islands or Isle of Man for any period of at least 5 years?'
JUROR_QUALIFY_QUESTION_MENTAL_HEALTH_SEC: Are you being detained, looked after or treated under the Mental Health Act?
your answer to the question, 'Are you being detained, looked after or treated under the Mental Health Act?'
JUROR_QUALIFY_QUESTION_MENTAL_HEALTH_CAP: Has it been decided that you 'lack mental capacity'?
your answer to the question, 'Has it been decided that you 'lack mental capacity'?'
JUROR_QUALIFY_QUESTION_BAIL: Are you currently on bail for a criminal offence?
JUROR_QUALIFY_QUESTION_BAIL_READER: your answer to the question, 'Are you currently on bail for a criminal offence?'
JUROR_QUALIFY_QUESTION_CONVICTED: Have you been found guilty of a criminal offence?
JUROR_QUALIFY_QUESTION_CONVICTED_READER: your answer to the question, 'Have you been found guilty of a criminal offence?'
OB_QUALIFY_QUESTION: You answered the eligibility questions for the person you're replying for
OB_QUALIFY_QUESTION_LIVED_CONSECUTIVE: Since they turned 13, has their main address been in the UK, Channel Islands or Isle of Man for any period of at least 5 years?
OB_QUALIFY_QUESTION_LIVED_CONSECUTIVE_RE: your answer to the question, 'Since they turned 13, has their main address been in the UK, Channel Islands or Isle of Man for any period of at least 5 years?'
OB_QUALIFY_QUESTION_MENTAL_HEALTH_SECTIO: Is the person you're replying for being detained, looked after or treated under the Mental Health Act?
your answer to the question, 'Is the person you're replying for being detained, looked after or treated under the Mental Health Act?'
OB_QUALIFY_QUESTION_MENTAL_HEALTH_CAPACI: Has it been decided that the person you're replying for 'lacks mental capacity'?
your answer to the question, 'Has it been decided that the person you're replying for 'lacks mental capacity'?'
OB_QUALIFY_QUESTION_BAIL: Is the person currently on bail for a criminal offence?
OB_QUALIFY_QUESTION_BAIL_READER: your answer to the question, 'Is the person currently on bail for a criminal offence?'
OB_QUALIFY_QUESTION_CONVICTED: Has the person been found guilty of a criminal offence?
OB_QUALIFY_QUESTION_CONVICTED_READER: your answer to the question, 'Has the person been found guilty of a criminal offence?'
JUROR_CONFIRM_DATE_HEADER: You responded to the proposed date of your jury service
OB_CONFIRM_DATE_HEADER: You responded to the proposed date of the jury service
JUROR_CONFIRM_DATE_PROMPT: Confirm the date of your jury service
JUROR_CONFIRM_DATE_READER: your answer to the question, 'Confirm the date of your jury service'
OB_CONFIRM_DATE_PROMPT: Confirm the date of their jury service
OB_CONFIRM_DATE_READER: your answer to the question, 'Confirm the date of their jury service'
JUROR_CONFIRM_DATE: I can do jury service on the date shown
OB_CONFIRM_DATE: The person I'm answering for can do jury service on the date shown
JUROR_LATER_DATE_REQUEST: I need to change the date of my jury service
JUROR_EXCUSAL_REQUEST: I cannot do jury service and would like to be excused
OB_LATER_DATE_REQUEST: I need to change the date of jury service for the person I'm answering for
OB_EXCUSAL_REQUEST: The person I'm answering for cannot do jury service and would like to be excused
JUROR_CHANGE_DATE_HEADER: As you asked to do your jury service on a different date you told us
JUROR_CHANGE_DATE_QUESTION_1: Tell us why you need another date for your jury service
JUROR_CHANGE_DATE_QUESTION_1_READER: your explanation for why you need to change the date of your jury service
OB_CHANGE_DATE_HEADER: As you asked for the person to do jury service on a different date you told us
OB_CHANGE_DATE_QUESTION_1: Tell us why they need another date for their jury service
OB_CHANGE_DATE_QUESTION_1_READER: your explanation for why the person needs to change the date of their jury service
JUROR_CHANGE_DATE_QUESTION_2: Choose 3 Mondays when you can start jury service
JUROR_CHANGE_DATE_QUESTION_2_READER: the dates you gave for when you can do jury service in the next 12 months
OB_CHANGE_DATE_QUESTION_2: Choose 3 Mondays when they can start jury service
OB_CHANGE_DATE_QUESTION_2_READER: the dates you gave for when the person can do jury service in the next 12 months
JUROR_EXCUSAL_HEADER: Because you asked to be excused from jury service, you told us
OB_EXCUSAL_HEADER: Because you asked for the person you're replying for to be excused from jury service, you told us
JUROR_EXCUSAL_PROMPT: Say why you need to be excused from jury service
JUROR_EXCUSAL_PROMPT_READER: the reason you gave for why you need to be excused from jury service
OB_EXCUSAL_PROMPT: Say why the person needs to be excused from jury service
OB_EXCUSAL_PROMPT_READER: the reason you gave for why the person needs to be excused from jury service
JUROR_EMPLOYED_HEADER: You told us whether you had worked for the criminal justice system
OB_EMPLOYED_HEADER: You told us whether the person had worked for the criminal justice system
JUROR_EMPLOYED_QUESTION: Have you worked in the criminal justice system in the last 5 years?
JUROR_EMPLOYED_QUESTION_READER: your answer to the question, 'Have you worked in the criminal justice system in the last 5 years?'
OB_EMPLOYED_QUESTION: Has the person you're replying for worked in the criminal justice system in the last 5 years?
OB_EMPLOYED_QUESTION_READER: your answer to the question, 'Has the person you're replying for worked in the criminal justice system in the last 5 years?'
JUROR_ASSISTANCE_HEADER: You told us about any help you'll need in court
OB_ASSISTANCE_HEADER: You told us about any help the person you're replying for needs in court
JUROR_ASSISTANCE_QUESTION_1: Do you have a disability or impairment that means you’ll need extra support or facilities in the court building where you are doing your Jury Service?
JUROR_ASSISTANCE_QUESTION_1_READER: the description of your disability or impairment
JUROR_ASSISTANCE_QUESTION_2: Tell us about any special arrangements or help you need while you're doing jury service
JUROR_ASSISTANCE_QUESTION_2_READER: the special arrangements or help you need while you're doing jury service
OB_ASSISTANCE_QUESTION_1: Does the person have a disability or impairment that means they’ll need extra support or facilities in the court building where they are doing jury service?
OB_ASSISTANCE_QUESTION_1_READER: the description of the disability or impairment for the person you're replying for
OB_ASSISTANCE_QUESTION_2: Tell us about any special arrangements or help the person you're answering for needs while they're doing jury service
OB_ASSISTANCE_QUESTION_2_READER: the special arrangements or help that the person you're answering for needs while they're doing jury service
WARNING_TEXT: You may be convicted and fined up to £1000 if you give false information to evade jury service. This also applies if you fail to give us the information we need to decide if you’re eligible to do jury service.
OB_WARNING_TEXT: You may be convicted and fined up to £1000 if you give false information for the person summoned to evade jury service. This also applies if you fail to give us the information we need to decide if the person summoned is eligible to do jury service.
JUROR_CONFIRM_TRUE: The information I have given is true to the best of my knowledge.
JUROR_UNDERSTAND_MUST_BE_TRUE: I understand that the answers I have given may be checked and that I may be prosecuted if I have given false information on purpose.
OB_CONFIRM_TRUE: The answers I have given for the person I'm replying for are true as far as I know.
OB_UNDERSTAND_MUST_BE_TRUE: I understand that the answers I have given may be checked and that I may be prosecuted if I have given false information on purpose.
